title: Bus Types VW Show 17/18/19 April 2015 Oswestry Showground

posts.content:
We would like to invite you along to the Bus Types VW Show, to be held on the 17, 18, 19 April at the Oswestry Showground, Shropshire.

With over 200 Trade Stands, 100+ Show Vehicles on Display, loads of great entertainment and thousands of visitors attending each year, then why not be part of the first Bus Event in the calendar!

Why not grab you Advanced Weekend Ticket at a discounted price over at www.bus-types.co.uk or Pre-book into one of the Show Vehicle Displays where you will receive FREE Weekend Entry!

Hope to see you all at the show.
All the best from the Bus Types Team
